solution_line_template: During the heavy rain, the tank collects {rate_L_per_min} * {duration_minutes} = <<{rate_L_per_min}*{duration_minutes}={collected_water}>>{collected_water} L of water
The tank has a total of {initial_water} + {collected_water} = <<{initial_water}+{collected_water}={total_water}>>{total_water} L of water
